amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent the Secretary of Energy from reallocating funds remaining from the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act from one State to another.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to strike language related to the allocation of funds relating to weatherization assistance funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 259 (Roll no. 542).
